Sentencas: The performance of Cu cermets as anodes for the direct oxidation of CH4 in solid oxide fuel cells was examined.
Titulo: Direct oxidation of hydrocarbons in a solid oxide fuel cell I. Methane oxidation

Sentencas: Mixtures of Cu and yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) were found to give similar performance to Ni-YSZ cermets when H-2 was used as the fuel, but did not deactivate in dry CH4.
Titulo: Direct oxidation of hydrocarbons in a solid oxide fuel cell I. Methane oxidation

Sentencas: While Cu-YSZ was essentially inert to methane, the addition of ceria to the anode gave rise to reasonable power densities and stable operation over a period of at least 3 days.
Titulo: Direct oxidation of hydrocarbons in a solid oxide fuel cell I. Methane oxidation

Sentencas: Proof of direct oxidation of CH4 came from chemical analysis of the products leaving the cell.
Titulo: Direct oxidation of hydrocarbons in a solid oxide fuel cell I. Methane oxidation

Sentencas: The major carbon-containing product was CO2, with only traces of CO observed, and there was excellent agreement between the actual cell current and that predicted by the methane conversion.
Titulo: Direct oxidation of hydrocarbons in a solid oxide fuel cell I. Methane oxidation

Sentencas: These results demonstrate that direct, electrocatalytic oxidation of dry methane is possible, with reasonable performance.
Titulo: Direct oxidation of hydrocarbons in a solid oxide fuel cell I. Methane oxidation
